title: Miles Market
description: Grocery store with a take-out deli. Stocks many vegan, gluten-free, and uncommon health food options. Vegan deli items are labeled and might include quinoa salad, dahl, 3-bean salad, and others. Delivery catering "Miles To-Go" is available if you would like them to deliver to your hotel or residence. The cashier puts your groceries in recyclable blue-bags.
